title: Bug 9826[Contributions] ActionContributionItem caches Images forever
description: ActionContributionItem has an image cache that caches images forever, and won'trelease them until the Display goes down.If an Action updates its Image, suchas a background color or foreground color action, It's ImageDescriptor isconstantly changing.ActionContributionItem$ImageCache creates an SWT Imagefor each descriptor.I verified this by constantly (a.k.a. programmatically) changing an actionsImageDescriptor, using only ImageData to build the descriptor.I quickly gota "no more handles" crash.
